channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: More Iranians with criminal histories arrested by ICE in Trump's security sweep: 'Worst of the worst'
item.description: ICE arrests four additional Iranian nationals with criminal histories amid concerns about sleeper cells following strikes on Iran's nuclear sites

item.title: Crypto market bounces back after President Trump announced a ceasefire between Israel and Iran
item.description: The crypto market added 2% to its market cap between Monday night and Tuesday afternoon.

item.title: Biden Admin Let 729 Iranian Border-Crossers Loose Into America: Report
item.description: The lack of border security under the Biden administration undermined national security on multiple fronts.

item.title: Trump’s chip tariff threat sparks pushback from auto industry to tech
item.description: The possible levy of up to 25% has united rivals like Tesla, General Motors, and Ford in voicing reservations.

item.title: 3 Takeaways From The U.S. Bombing Of Iran’s Nuclear Sites
item.description: The bombings are a powerful deterrent to the 'CRINK' alliance; talk of America’s decline is merely wishful thinking; and leadership matters.

item.title: Emirates, Qatar Airways, and other major airlines are cancelling flights and halting routes amid uncertainty from U.S. strikes and a shaky Israel-Iran ceasefire deal
item.description: Airports and skies throughout the region have been on edge since Israel began the deadly war on June 13.

item.title: Trump’s Strike on Iran Was Constitutional
item.description: The president acted to protect the nation’s security within the powers granted to his office by the Constitution.

item.title: There Is No Trumpism

item.title: How Did New York City Get Here?
item.description: In truth, the city’s political culture has been dying for some time. The mayoral race is just the most recent evidence.

item.title: Uber and Waymo are rolling out robotaxi services in Atlanta as competition heats up with Elon Musk’s Tesla
item.description: Waymo's driverless march into Atlanta comes just days after Tesla finally launched a limited robotaxi service in Austin.
